response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you.

We propose to sell this remarkable product to you for $1,250,000. This is a special discount considering its true worth, aimed at securing your satisfaction and ensuring a long-term relationship between us.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction without delay. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
